description: All agents have the same number of activities (19), which is unusual and may indicate a lack of diversity in task distribution or a reporting error.
recommendation: Investigate the task allocation mechanism to ensure tasks are being distributed according to each agent's role and capacity. Verify if the reporting system is accurately capturing activity data.

description: API latency is relatively high at 134.721 ms, which could impact user experience and system responsiveness.
recommendation: Analyze the API request and response times to identify bottlenecks. Consider optimizing the API endpoints or scaling the infrastructure to handle requests more efficiently.

description: Throughput is at the same value as API latency (134.721), which might indicate a reporting or calculation error.
recommendation: Review the throughput calculation method to ensure it is accurately reflecting the system's performance. Verify if the data collection process is correctly implemented.
